creator: GetNatty
descriptionHtml:
Are you a direct-to-consumer eCommerce brand?
Are you a traditional retail store owner?

Download Swirl- A virtual shopping mobile app that uses your existing smartphone and turns it into a super-intelligent video catalogue creation, engagement, monetization, analytics and retargeting tool which enables you to:

a) Set up your online video store 🏪
b) Create shoppable videos - both pre-recorded tik-tok style short videos called SWIRLS or schedule a live video session 📷
c) Start sharing unique links on any digital or social platform 💪

Once the audience clicks on the link, without having the need to download a mobile app, they get a full screen, movie style, live video shopping experience where they can..

FEATURES:

1) Request SHOW ME to see the product details 🙇
2) Record a VOICE NOTE to send an audio message 🎤
3) ASK A QUESTION privately 🙋🏻‍♀️
4) LIVE CHAT 👨‍💻
5) CONNECT ON WHATSAPP 🥳
6) Send / receive TEXT / SMS 👌
7) REQUEST PRICE (in case of a custom / made to order product) 👍
8) Place a VOICE / VIDEO CALL 🤳
9) Book an appointment to WALK-IN 🙏
10) Click BUY NOW to complete the transaction ✌️

..this kind of interactive video shopping experience will not only greatly enhance your customer engagement by 7X but also start giving your customers that turbocharged interactive shopping experience that directly leads to a 9% conversion, at least 5 times higher than the industry average of 0.5–2%. Plus it will help you to imprint a strong brand recall value that ultimately leads to a high-value customer relationship that greatly increases lifetime loyalty and repeat business.

So if you are a brand today that is looking to bring that human connection to online shopping then we will help you. Whether you are a direct-to-consumer eCommerce brand or a traditional retailer, or an SMB, you can use Swirl live as both, a standalone solution to build your virtual business OR a fully-integrated video commerce solution that automatically integrates with your existing eCommerce platform whether on WordPress, Shopify, Magento, Wix, woo-commerce or BigCommerce using a short code, API’s, and plugins and provides the same interactive virtual shopping to your website visitors.

So what are you waiting for? Don’t let uncertainties cloud your judgement, don’t let other people’s opinions of you become your reality, go out there and build your own future and we promise you that we will have you covered.

At the end of the day, all of us business owners are chasing those lifetime worth of value customers — which could be our biggest moat, and the post covid era presents an excellent opportunity for early movers to go out there and try something new and innovative to build a competitive advantage over our peers. Visit https://www.goswirl.live to GET STARTED today or BOOK A DEMO and our team will get in touch with you asap 🤝 Already 100+ brands such as Greenberry organics, PN RAO, BeChef, HumbleBee Luxury and AltoVida trusts us.

For more details or email us on brands@getnatty.com

title: SWIRL - Live video shopping

creator: GetNatty
descriptionHtml:
Create and share shoppable videos, host live streaming events, and view analytics in a simple dashboard. Built to help online and offline retailers just like you, the SWIRL app will turn your smartphone into your favourite sales and marketing tool.
With SWIRL, you can turbocharge engagement, and interact directly with customers to gain valuable
information on shopping preferences and FAQs.

FEATURES:
Swirl offers these powerful features:
1. Schedule 1-to-1 live shopping appointments
2. Create one-to-many interactive videos, tutorials and demos
3. Record hyper-engaging short shoppable videos
4. Simulcast across Facebook, YouTube, and Instagram

BENEFITS:
1. Create and manage your product list, upload photos, change prices on the go
2. Customers can see catalogues and add to cart without leaving video stream
3. Share live stream and video call invites with one-click access, no app downloads necessary
4. Initiate live chats and solve customer queries in real-time

USING THE APP
SWIRL is a fully integrated live commerce solution that integrates with all major eCommerce platforms. Just download the app and create a virtual store in a few easy steps. Log in through your smartphone to start creating content and engaging with customers or access it on your desktop/laptop to see valuable first-party data and analytics.
descriptionShort: Create shoppable videos, go live streaming and sell more online on social media

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Live Stream simulcast across Facebook, YouTube, and Instagram
Customer can initiate/schedule video call from Desktop View.
